metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6370 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in the printbuf APIs in json-c before 0.12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjson-c2 - 0.11-3ubuntu1.2
libjson0 - 0.11-3ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: json-c package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.11-3ubuntu1.2').
